channel.title: Warframe Farming on Warframe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Warframe Farming on Warframe Blog

item.title: How and Where to get Hexenon
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe farming guide. Today I want to talk a little bit about farming the new Jupiter resource - Hexenon.

item.title: Nitain Extract Farming
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe farming guide. Today I want to talk about Nitain Extract. A pretty annoying resource when it comes to farming.

item.title: How and Where to get Toroids
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe farming guide. Today I’m gonna show you where you can get all three types of the different toroids that you need to either build Garuda or to gain standing with the Vox Solaris Syndicate in Warframe.

item.title: Polymer Bundles Farming. How and Where to get Polymer Bundles
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe farming guide. Today I want to show you where and how to farm polymer bundles.

item.title: How To Farm Relics - Lith, Meso, Neo & Axi
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. And today I want to talk about missions where you can efficiently farm lots of Void relics.

item.title: Orokin Cells Farming. How and Where to get Orokin Cells
item.description: Hello guys! Welcome to another Warframe farming guide and today I want to show you where and how to farm Orokin Cells.

item.title: How To Farm Endo
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article! Today I want to show you where and how to farm endo.

item.title: How to farm focus points -150,000 Focus Points in under 5 Minutes!
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another article. I want to show you a very efficient, if not the most efficientÂ method for farming lots of Focus points, around 150000 Focus in under 5 minutes.

item.title: Where And How To Farm Kuva. Endless Kuva Survival
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another article. And today I want to show you where and how to farm Kuva.

item.title: Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinates Farming Guide
item.description: Hey guys and welcome to another Warframe article. And today we’ll be farming the Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinates which you can either use to craft the Mutalist Alad V Assassinate Key which takes three nav coordinates to build or you can trade them with other players for platinum because they’re always in demand.

item.title: How to farm Cetus Wisp
item.description: Hey guys! Welcome to another warframe article and today I want to show you a pretty cool way of farming Cetus Wisp.

item.title: Warframe Plastids Farming
item.description: Hello guys! Today I’m doing a quick Plastids farming guide.

item.title: Oxium Farming
item.description: Hello guys! Welcome to another Warframe farming guide and this is going to be a very quick article showing you how to efficiently farm Oxium.

item.title: Warframe Neurodes Farming
item.description: Hello guys! Today I’m doing a quick guide on farming neurodes.

item.title: Warframe Farming Stalker (Dread,Despair, Hate & War)
item.description: Hey guys. Welcome to another Warframe article and today we’re gonna be farming Stalker.

item.title: How To Farm Credits - 750k Credits Per Hour
item.description: Hey guys! Welcome to another Warframe article and today I’m going to show you how you can easily get around 1 million credits in 1 hour without using a credit booster.
